data.name: Trainz 2022 DLC - Balezino Mosti Sessions - Lichachove to Mosti (Day / Night Passenger Runs)
data.detailed_description:
FULL DETAILS
Note: These 2 sessions require the route Balezino - Mosti, Russia.


Session 1 - Lichachove - Mosti No 432.
Depart from Лихачеве (Lichachove) at 03:32 PM and follow the main line to Мосты (Mosti). Junctions are set automatically. Observe all signals and follow the schedule.

Proceed to the first stop at Белореченск (Belorechensk), then Крутоборка (Krutoborka), then Борисполь (Borispol). After a 2 minute wait at Borispol continue on to Лельмаа (Lelma), then the final stop is Мосты (Mosti) at 4:32 PM.

Wait for the guards instruction before you leave each station.

There are stops for skipping trains on a single-track section. The journey time of the route - 1:00.

Recommended speed : 80-90 km/h

Session 2 - Lichachove - Mosti No 435.
Depart from Лихачеве (Lichachove) at 01:32 AM and follow the main line to Мосты (Mosti). Junctions are set automatically. Observe all signals and follow the schedule.

Proceed to the first stop at Белореченск (Belorechensk), then Крутоборка (Krutoborka), then Борисполь (Borispol). After a 2 minute wait at Borispol continue on to Лельмаа (Lelma), then the final stop is Мосты (Mosti) at 2:32 AM.

Wait for the guards instruction before you leave each station.

There are stops for skipping trains on a single-track section. The journey time of the route - 1:00.

Recommended speed : 80-90 km/h

data.short_description: This pack includes two sessions for the separate Balezino - Mosti, Russia, operating a passenger train from Lichachove to Mosti during the day, and during the night. Note, this pack requires the separate Balezino - Mosti, Russia route.
data.supported_languages: English, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Dutch, Polish, Russian, French, German

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 3GHz 64Bit Processor
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 430 or better/ AMD ATI 5550 or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 11.6
  • Processor: Intel i5 2Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555 with 1GB VRAM supporting OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
